title: Divine Kundan Haaram Set with Emerald, Ruby, and Pearls - A Timeless Heirloom
materials: intricately set with brilliant-cut Kundan stones. Features an oval-cut emerald (pachcha) at the center
and lustrous freshwater pearls. Finished with a Hyderabadi polish for enduring shine.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases the traditional Kundan setting technique, where uncut diamonds (Kundan) are meticulously embedded in gold foil. The design incorporates floral motifs along the necklace chain and pendant. A central emerald is framed by Kundan, while the ruby pendant adds a vibrant contrast. Delicate pearl drops enhance the overall elegance. The maang tikka (chutti) echoes the necklace design, completing the set.
colors: accented by the vivid green of the emerald
the rich red of the ruby
and the soft ivory of the pearls.
description: This Kundan Haaram set is a true masterpiece, combining traditional craftsmanship with timeless design. The use of high-quality materials and meticulous artistry ensures a piece of lasting beauty and value. The classic combination of emerald, ruby, Kundan, and pearls makes it an ideal choice for brides and anyone seeking a statement piece with cultural significance. A perfect blend of elegance and tradition to make any occasion special.
